body_html:
Sorry, I don't know how to use that param too.
According to BasicDecoder's code output_layer should be instance of tf.layersLayer.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/basic_decoder.py

body:
Sorry, I don't know how to use that  param too.
According to BasicDecoder's code output_layer should be instance of tf.layersLayer.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.2/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/basic_decoder.py
